long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Want to improve your posture 🦐?  
«Sit up straight: posture reminder» is a extension that helps you remember to do it easy. 
Its sleek and eye-catching design ensures you'll never miss a reminder, and the flexible settings allow you to choose how often you'd like to receive notifications to maintain good posture.

Features:

🆓 Free: 
Enjoy all the benefits with no hidden costs!

🔥 Stylish and noticeable: 
Bright and eye-catching notifications that grab your attention.

⚙️ Flexible: 
Customize the frequency of reminders to suit your needs.

You'll always remember to maintain good posture!
